${brand_label_url} [${brand_url}]

APPROVAL REQUEST
A new ${brand_service} has registered and is awaiting approval. Please review
the information provided below.

Name: ${name}

E-mail: ${email}

Website: ${url}

Description: ${description}

If the request seems genuine, you can approve the provider by clicking on the
button below. Once approved, the provider will be able to sign in and start
registering services that ${brand} users can add to their conversations.

If the request seems dubious, please contact the provider for clarifications
before proceeding.

Approve [${url}]Jeigu negalite spustelėti ant mygtuko, nukopijuokite ir įdėkite
šią nuorodą į savo naršyklę:

${url}

Prašome neatsakinėti į šį laišką.
